articles.author: ANI
articles.title: T20 WC: "Massive win for us....": Afghanistan skipper Rashid after victory over Australia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australia were left flabbergasted following an inspirational spell from Afghanistan bowlers led by Gulbadin Naib and Naveen-ul-Haq, which sealed a 21-run win for the Asian side in the Super 8 clash of the ongoing T20 World Cup at Arnos Vale Ground. | Crickit
articles.content: Kingstown [Saint Vincent], : Following his side's 21-run win over Australia, Afghanistan skipper Rashid Khan said that the victory is massive for their country and expressed happiness with performanc… [+2840 chars]

articles.author: icc
articles.title: Cummins creates history with second consecutive T20 World Cup hat-trick - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Another milestone for Australia's premier fast bowler as he claims yet another hat-trick.
articles.content:
It was just the eighth time that a bowler has completed a hat-trick at a Men's T20 World Cup and the first time a player has achieved the feat on multiple occasions.
Cummins is already a member of a… [+275 chars]
